data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module tries do define an object oriented approach for working
    with ithreads. As it imposes some way of doing things and has not
    been tested along with modules from the "Thread" namespace, I think
    it should be placed in its own namespace, so has to not pollute
    "Thread".

    If there is a better alternative, I'll be glad to update the module
    and include it in an existing namespace.

    Thanks.
